info.name: CivClicker - Stylin and Profilin
info.description: Just some cosmetic tweaks for the incremental game, CivClicker.
info.additionalInfo:
Current Version: 0.5

New Changes:

  Resources, the 'Work Pane', Population/Jobs, Events, and Diety info are all now separated in their own modules, easily distinguished by their backgrounds.

  The 'Work Pane', which is the Buildings / Upgrades / Diety / Conquests area, had its Pane Selectors restyled and colored up.

  Toned down the brightness of the buttons a bit. I realized that they were a little bright    coupled with the white text.

  Fixed the single quote issue messing with the download of the .js file.

Things I'm Planning:

  Further refinements to the spacing and colors. Possibly a different background image, but with a similar color scheme.

  Icons for the different resources (Basic, Special, and Workers).
